about_the_game:
Show your support for the indie developer of Rock 'N Roll by purchasing this Gold Heart Hero DLC which makes your player ship gold in color instead of the default blue!

Rock 'N Roll was drastically reduced in price in February of 2021, almost a full four years after its launch here on Steam. Supporting this developer with this Gold Heart DLC is your way of expressing your gratitude for this game and saying that you enjoy it and appreciate its development!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Ghz Cpu
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB graphics card minimum
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650 or AMD HD 6870 or above
